mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo (nickname, phone, email, password, level, gender, city, birthday, headImgUrl, info) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{password}, #{level}, #{gender}, #{city}, #{birthday}, #{headImgUrl}, #{info})
mapper.update: update userinfo set headImgUrl = #{headImgUrl} where id = #{userId}
update userinfo set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
update userinfo set phone = #{phone} where id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, nickname, phone, email, level, gender, city, birthday, headImgUrl, info FROM userinfo WHERE phone = #{phone}
